tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr Anusha is very professional and holds lots of patience for patients. She hears all problems tries to short out properly. She remembers about patients and even refers to other doctors if she is not an expert in any issue . *** ***** ****** *********** ***** *** ********** She is perfect doctor for complex issues as well as regular diseases.

I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Anusha . Their expertise and caring demeanor made me feel completely at ease during my consultation. They took the time to address all my concerns and explain everything thoroughly. I'm grateful to have found such a knowledgeable and compassionate endocrinologist. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Wonderful experience with Shnata Clinic. Dr. Anusha was a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured I had a smooth checkup and follow-up. I am so glad I chose this Clinic and would highly recommend to anyone.
She seemed not very focused while consulting. I expected more proactive and detailed suggestions on food habits which I required.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor doesnt sit in the mentioned clinics. She used some other doctor’s prescription pad  in Shrushti Gastro clinic. 
She had no time to see the reports and suggest alternate medication. My mother was in so much pain but still she didnt give us time. We had to ultimately visit another doctor.

Very bad experience. Wont recommend.
Dr. Anusha is very friendly and listen to problems carefully. My problem was not her expertise but she helped me.

I had an exceptional experience with doctor Anusha. She was extremely friendly, listened attentively to my problems, and suggested tests with confidence that my issues would be resolved. I felt heard, understood, and reassured throughout the consultation. Her expertise, positive attitude, and genuine care made the experience truly remarkable. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking a compassionate and competent healthcare professional.
She is a lovely doctor, who reaches out to her patients on time and gives valuable advice. Will recommend!
Went to the doctor to show my general body and hormonal reports. She explained everything properly, and didn’t give any medicines just for the sake of it.

It seemed full proessional behavoiour. ** **** ** * ******** *** **** ** ********* ******* **** *** *** *** **** ******* ** **** ***** ******** I asked for diet plan etc to reduce sugar level but he told after taking package only guidance will be given. first take package  then only I will be guided to reduce sugar. So I politely wasted money on consultation fee and left clinic. I didn't like single thing about doctor/clinic and will not recommend her at all
reply_text: Hi Harsh.. thank you for letting us know how you felt and i am very sorry for that.. this will help me and one care team to improve better.. thank you.

I already see improvement in my health.

Dr. Anusha is a doctor who made my mom way more comfortable talking about issues she was facing due to diabetes.

review:
It’s difficult to reach Dr. Anusha.. as discussed with doctor, she suggested me to share the blood report to the receptionist phone number , it’s been 10 days still I haven’t received any updates..  I am following up with them but no updates .

This is not the first time, before also she changed my bp medicine and due to sudden change in meds my blood pressure started raising .. 

Somehow I connected her  through 3rd person and doctor said she will write different meds for bp.. but again after the phone conversation no updates on medicines again .. 

So in short .. it’s difficult to reach her ..
reply_text: I am extremely sorry for this experience at my clinic. I highly apologize for this. Thank you for letting me know. I will try nobody else faces this.
